profile.title: Xogta Isticmaalaha
profile.mustLogin: Waa inaad gasho si aad u aragto dejimaha.
profile.autoTranslate: U turjun fariimaha si otomaatig ah
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Muuji qoraalka asalka ah iyo turjumaaddiisa
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Muuji asalka iyo turjumaadda isku mar
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Ilbiriqsiyo kahor inta aan si otomaatig ah loo tirtirin
profile.avatarError: Khalad ayaa ka dhacay soo gelinta sawirka
profile.noPrivateKey: Kuma jiro fure gaar ah qalabkan oo la dhoofin karo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Deji eray sir ah si aad u qariso kaydka:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kaydka la qarxiyay waa la soo dejiyay.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Geli erayga sirta ah ee kaydkan:
profile.importSuccess: Furaha gaarka ah qalabkan waa lagu soo dejiyay.
profile.importFailed: Soo dejinta waa ay fashilantay (eray sir khaldan ama fayl dhaawacmay).
profile.keysRotated: Lammaane fure cusub waa la sameeyay furaha guudna waa la soo geliyay.
profile.importKey: Soo dejiso kaydka furaha la qarxiyay
profile.keyDisclaimer: Furahaaga gaarka ah weligiis kama bixi doono qalabkan. Dhoofso nuqul sir ah si aad ugu soo celiso qalab kale.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa nooca bilaashka ah — isticmaal qorraxda/daarta xulashooyinka hoose. U cusboonaysii si aad u furto mawduucyo kale.
profile.backupDesc: Abuur kayd sir ah oo leh eray sir, dibna ugu soo celi qalab kale si loo waafajiyo.
profile.notifyOnCopy: I ogeysii haddii fariintayda la koobiyo
profile.loadFailed: Lama soo rogi karo xogta isticmaalaha
profile.followHint: Sheekadooda waxay ka muuqan doontaa quudintaada haddii ay daabacaan dadkooda raacsan (ama guud ahaan).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Gudbi wicitaanada iyo fariimaha soo socda taleefankaaga ama iimaylkaaga la xaqiijiyay. Wicitaannada/fariimaha baxaya waxay muujin karaan lambarkaaga Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Dooro fariin ama qol sheeko si aad u bilowdo sheekada
